101  $r = [ ];
102  if (isset ( $this->code )) {

104  }

106  $r ['status'] = $this->status;
107  }

109  $r ['source'] = [ 'pointer' => $this->source ];
110  }

113  }

116  }

120  public static function notFound($keyValues,$source=null){
